dialogueTree.title: Limbic System: "It's easier, this time, drifting of..."
dialogueTree.text: It's easier, this time, drifting off. Your head has found a comfortable indent in the pillow. Your legs and your torso feel like lead weights sinking to the bottom of the sea, until they're suddenly light...

links.title: You: "I've heard this song before."
links.text: I've heard this song before.

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "This is greatest hits material. Bla..."
links.text: This is greatest hits material. Black tape spinning and spinning and spinning... You finally tired yourself. Cornered the flicker of your mind and extinguished it.

links.title: Limbic System: "For now -- a little while -- you ca..."
links.text: For now -- a little while -- you can...

links.title: You: "(Sleep. Without words or images.)"
links.text: (Sleep. Without words or images.)

links.title: Limbic System: "When the pictograms and the hierogl..."
links.text: When the pictograms and the hieroglyphs of the world return, they seem silent somehow. The alarm rings quietly too. You're ready.

links.title: Half Light: "Ready -- but something is coming. I..."
links.text: Ready -- but something is coming. It always is.

links.title: You: "[Open your eyes.]"
links.text: [Open your eyes.]

links.title: You: "Sing along -- in silent communion."
links.text: Sing along -- in silent communion.

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Blackness, blackness, blackness. Th..."
links.text: Blackness, blackness, blackness. The ultimate disco. The ruins of your life behind you, still smouldering. Ashes rise. But you're not looking.

links.title: You: "How many days have I been in Martin..."
links.text: How many days have I been in Martinaise already...

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "There are no days here. There are n..."
links.text: There are no days here. There are no weeks. Just black tape spinning. On repeat. Until the end.

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "This respite -- you've earned it, b..."
links.text: This respite -- you've earned it, brother. Bask in the darkness. Let it swallow you up and swivel you around while you forget everything you've managed to remember...

links.title: You: "But I've been bad. I haven't earned..."
links.text: But I've been bad. I haven't earned this.

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "No, you haven't. You've just *been*..."
links.text: No, you haven't. You've just *been*.

links.title: You: "Thank you, darkness. Thank you."
links.text: Thank you, darkness. Thank you.

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "You're welcome, Harry-boy. You earn..."
links.text: You're welcome, Harry-boy. You earned it.

links.title: You: "(Fall into a deep, uninterrupted sl..."
links.text: (Fall into a deep, uninterrupted sleep.)

links.title: Limbic System: "After centuries of darkness, the al..."
links.text: After centuries of darkness, the alarm rings -- but what's this? You *actually* feel rested. There's no time to cuddle with your pillow, however, or as much as shiver from the cold. The world awaits.

links.title: Volition: "Go."
links.text: Go.

links.title: You: "Is this the last dream?"
links.text: Is this the last dream?

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "No. This is the one before that. We..."
links.text: No. This is the one before that. We'll just keep cycling it for you, if you don't mind. As long as we can. Spin it like black yarn.

links.title: Limbic System: "Enjoy it while it lasts."
links.text: Enjoy it while it lasts.
